jcr:content.jcr:description: Signify’s innovative lighting solutions has enabled Sartorius to be a sustainability-centric organization while creating a productive workplace.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Sartorius Singapore - POC

gc11v3_generictext.title: Illuminating a new office to optimize productivity and well-being

cell1Component-gc11.body: Signify’s suite of innovative lighting solutions has enabled Sartorius to walk the talk of being a sustainability-centric organization while creating a conducive workspace for creativity, productivity and collaborations to thrive.
cell1Component-gc11.title: Sartorius Stedim Uga Buga, Singapore

cell1Component-gc11.body: Amit Sharma, Managing Director, Sartorius Singapore, Sartorius Stedim Singapore
cell1Component-gc11.title: We chose Signify as their unique range of lighting innovations aligns perfectly to our goals of enhancing our employees’ health and well-being while creating positive environmental impact.”

cell2Component-gc11.body: Sartorius recognizes the impact of lighting on their employees’ health and well-being and on the environment at large. For their new office in Singapore, they were searching for sustainable lighting innovations to address the lack of daylight penetration in their laboratories while creating spaces for their employees to learn, interact and perform at their best every day.
cell2Component-gc11.subtitle: Customer Challenge

cell1Component-gc11.body:
Daylight helps us with our natural biological clock. By focusing on this, we sleep better, feel more energetic and are in a better mood. A shortage of daylight has a negative impact on our well-being.
The solution for simulating natural daylight was found at Meander Medical Center in NatureConnect. The Skylight luminaires give the feeling that you are looking directly outside. Together with the Daylight luminaires, they provide the energetic 'daylight feeling'.
12345
In addition to the automatic 24-hour biodynamic daily rhythm, nurses can also select other scenes via the wall switch. The Energize mode provides extra light for tasks where focus is required, and the Relax mode provides a warmer light experience.
cell1Component-gc11.subtitle: Solution

gc11v3_generictext.subtitle: Want to meet your sustainability goals with lighting?
